IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE.

1. LICENSE

By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using Nimbus Sync 0.6.2("Software") containing this software, you agree that this End User User License Agreement(EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

Unless you have a different license agreement signed by Bryson Dunn your use of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty.

Subject to the terms of this Agreement, Bryson Dunn grants to you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 in accordance with this Agreement and any other written agreement with Bryson Dunn. Bryson Dunn does not transfer the title of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a binding legal agreement between Bryson Dunn and the purchasers or users of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2.

If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 from your computer now and, if applicable, promptly return to Bryson Dunn by mail any copies of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 and related documentation and packaging in your possession.

2. DISTRIBUTION

Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold, offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may make one copy for archive purposes only. For information about redistribution of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 contact Bryson Dunn.

3. USER AGREEMENT

3.1 Use

Your license to use Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2.

3.2 Use Restrictions

You shall use Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful purpose. Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited.

Each licensed copy of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 means that you have loaded, installed, or run Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 on a computer or similar device. If you install Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 must be licensed separately.

You may make one copy of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of Bryson Dunn. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2. If any person other than yourself uses Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!

3.3 Copyright Restriction

This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile Nimbus Sync 0.6.2. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 in whole or in part.

Bryson Dunn's name, logo and graphics file that represents Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 shall not be used in any way to promote products developed with Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 . Bryson Dunn retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto.

Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2, products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for Bryson Dunn.

3.4 Limitation of Responsibility

You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend Bryson Dunn , its employees, agents and distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or in any way connected with your use of Bryson Dunn's Software.

In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will Bryson Dunn , its employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 or the use or inability to use Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence.

Bryson Dunn's entire liability, without exception, is limited to the customers' reimbursement of the purchase price of the Software (maximum being the lesser of the amount paid by you and the suggested retail price as listed by Bryson Dunn ) in exchange for the return of the product, all copies, registration papers and manuals, and all materials that constitute a transfer of license from the customer back to Bryson Dunn.

3.5 Warranties

Except as expressly stated in writing, Bryson Dunn makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.

3.6 Governing Law

This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the United States applicable therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of United States therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.

3.7 Termination

Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 and destroy all copies of Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 supplied under this Agreement. The financial obligations incurred by you shall survive the expiration or termination of this license.

THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY Nimbus Sync 0.6.2 AS WELL.
